column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Definitely a fan. This place is good for a romantic dinner for two or a group setting. The share plates are amazing and the flavors are spot on. I know they are share plates for tapas but some of the potions are kind of sad in comparison to the price point. The goat cheese is amazing
column4: ohh and the octopus. It is usually really hard for some places to make octopus the right way however all of the times that I've order it
